dc_description_s: CARE_LONG_TERM_FACILITIES_ISDH_IN is a point shapefile showing the locations of 86 residential care facilities, 525 long-term care facilities (nursing homes), and 81 hospices included in various directories that appear on Web pages of the Indiana State Department of Health (ISDH). Using street addresses from the directory, a shapefile was created using the Geocoding tool in ESRI ArcMap 9.2 and street information licensed from Tele Atlas, Dynamap 2000 v. 17.0.
dc_creator_sm: Indiana State Department of Health (ISDH) (Data source)
dc_title_s: Residential Care Facilities, Nursing Homes, and Hospices: Indiana, 2007
